page.title: 04Golf Course - The Links
page.content: Perranporth Golf Course was designed by{James Braid}in{1927.}He was one of the greatest designers for golf clubs and golf courses.The golf course has still got the same things as in 1927. There is a shop,changing rooms,bar, billiard room and a tennis room.James Braid liked the idea of blind holes. The course is 52 years old and it is approximately 5 miles long.It has got a caravan site.There are 10 caravans and 1 mobile home.A boy in our class lives there.It should last well into the Twentieth century.James Braid died in 1956.The last golf course he designed was at Perranwell.The one at Perramwell has changed a lot since 1954.Perranporth golf club has approximately 355 members and 3 green keepers.There are two golf professionals.
